vulnerability.name: CVE-2025-47907
vulnerability.description: Cancelling a query (e.g. by cancelling the context passed to one of the query methods) during a call to the Scan method of the returned Rows can result in unexpected results if other queries are being made in parallel. This can result in a race condition that may overwrite the expected results with those of another query, causing the call to Scan to return either unexpected results from the other query or an error.

statements.impact_statement: database/sql is within the standard GO library, however, the module is never used within the sourcecode

vulnerability.name: CVE-2025-4673
vulnerability.description: Proxy-Authorization and Proxy-Authenticate headers persisted on cross-origin redirects potentially leaking sensitive information.

statements.impact_statement: go library contains the affected module, however, the affected module is not used by container, which results in the cve being misseading
